prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon resembling a mischievous crow with sleek black feathers.
Design a small, winged creature that has a playful personality and loves to steal shiny objects.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, often seen perched on streetlights at night.
Generate a bird-like Pokemon with a distinctive tuft of feathers on its head and a cheeky expression.
Make a dark and mysterious Pokemon that haunts forests and is known for its eerie cawing.
Show me a Pokemon with an elegant yet sly appearance, perfect for stealthy nighttime adventures.
Give me a quirky creature with a penchant for mischief, often found in the shadows.
